mapper.sql: a.net_id, a.user_id, a.net_name, a.comment_count, a.create_time, a.is_delete, a.ext1, a.ext2, a.ext3, a.ext4
mapper.insert: insert into network (net_id, user_id, net_name, comment_count, create_time, is_delete, ext1, ext2, ext3, ext4) values (#{netId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{netName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commentCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT}, #{ext1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext4,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update: update network set net_id = #{netId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, net_name = #{netName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment_count = #{commentCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT}, ext1 = #{ext1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ext2 = #{ext2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ext3 = #{ext3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ext4 = #{ext4,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where net_id = #{netId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

net_id = #{netId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
